Title: About Last Night
Writer: Leslye Headland (screenplay by), Tim Kazurinsky (based on the screenplay by), Denise DeClue (based on the screenplay by), David Mamet (based upon "Sexual Perversity in Chicago" by)
Actors: Kevin Hart, Michael Ealy, Regina Hall, Joy Bryant
Plot: Follow two couples as they journey from the bar to the bedroom and are eventually put to the test in the real world.
